segments.text: May's birthday is coming . Shall we buy her a birthday present or let her choose one for herself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think a surprise party may be better . But I forget when her birthday is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are such a good father . It's next Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . What shall we get for her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about a cell phone ? She is old enough to have one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . Shall we search on line to find an appropriate one or go to a phone store ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we can try shopping on line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Okay , here is the website .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure that May would love the pink one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably . People's consumptive habit is changing rapidly because of the internet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Totally . Computers bring with them convenience.Oh , what's wrong ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it's such a pain . We'd better go to a store later .
segments.speaker: S1
